saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:template match="/"><Root><xsl:apply-templates select="Root/item" mode="_Root_item_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates></Root></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document/vendor_address" mode="_Root_item_document_vendor_address_order1"> <vendor_address><name><xsl:value-of select="name"/></name><street><xsl:value-of select="street"/></street><suite><xsl:value-of select="suite"/></suite><city><xsl:value-of select="city"/></city><state><xsl:value-of select="state"/></state><zip><xsl:value-of select="zip"/></zip><country><xsl:value-of select="country"/></country></vendor_address></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document/registered_address" mode="_Root_item_document_registered_address_order1"> <registered_address><company_name><xsl:value-of select="company_name"/></company_name><street><xsl:value-of select="street"/></street><city><xsl:value-of select="city"/></city><state><xsl:value-of select="state"/></state><zip><xsl:value-of select="zip"/></zip><country><xsl:value-of select="country"/></country></registered_address></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document" mode="_Root_item_document_order1"> <document><title><xsl:value-of select="title"/></title><xsl:apply-templates select="vendor_address" mode="_Root_item_document_vendor_address_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates><page><xsl:value-of select="page"/></page><document_no><xsl:value-of select="document_no"/></document_no><date><xsl:value-of select="date"/></date><currency><xsl:value-of select="currency"/></currency><tax_id_number><xsl:value-of select="tax_id_number"/></tax_id_number><vendor_number><xsl:value-of select="vendor_number"/></vendor_number><our_tax_id_number><xsl:value-of select="our_tax_id_number"/></our_tax_id_number><reference_number><xsl:value-of select="reference_number"/></reference_number><xsl:apply-templates select="sold_to" mode="_Root_item_document_sold_to_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates><xsl:apply-templates select="material_withdrawals" mode="_Root_item_document_material_withdrawals_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates><total_qty><xsl:value-of select="total_qty"/></total_qty><total_net_value><xsl:value-of select="total_net_value"/></total_net_value><registered_company_no><xsl:value-of select="registered_company_no"/></registered_company_no><tax_reg_no><xsl:value-of select="tax_reg_no"/></tax_reg_no><federal_id_no><xsl:value-of select="federal_id_no"/></federal_id_no><xsl:apply-templates select="registered_address" mode="_Root_item_document_registered_address_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates></document></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document/material_withdrawals" mode="_Root_item_document_material_withdrawals_order1"> <material_withdrawals><date><xsl:value-of select="date"/></date><mov_ty><xsl:value-of select="mov_ty"/></mov_ty><qty><xsl:value-of select="qty"/></qty><unit><xsl:value-of select="unit"/></unit><tax_c><xsl:value-of select="tax_c"/></tax_c><net_value><xsl:value-of select="net_value"/></net_value><material_description><xsl:value-of select="material_description"/></material_description><material_no><xsl:value-of select="material_no"/></material_no><gross_price><xsl:value-of select="gross_price"/></gross_price></material_withdrawals></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document/sold_to" mode="_Root_item_document_sold_to_order1"> <sold_to><name><xsl:value-of select="name"/></name><xsl:apply-templates select="address" mode="_Root_item_document_sold_to_address_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates><xsl:apply-templates select="contact" mode="_Root_item_document_sold_to_contact_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates></sold_to></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document/sold_to/contact" mode="_Root_item_document_sold_to_contact_order1"> <contact><tel><xsl:value-of select="tel"/></tel><fax><xsl:value-of select="fax"/></fax><email><xsl:value-of select="email"/></email></contact></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item" mode="_Root_item_order1"> <item><xsl:apply-templates select="document" mode="_Root_item_document_order1"> </xsl:apply-templates></item></xsl:template><xsl:template match="/Root/item/document/sold_to/address" mode="_Root_item_document_sold_to_address_order1"> <address><street><xsl:value-of select="street"/></street><city><xsl:value-of select="city"/></city><state><xsl:value-of select="state"/></state><zip><xsl:value-of select="zip"/></zip><country><xsl:value-of select="country"/></country></address></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
